headline: Campbell’s Appoints Todd Cunfer Chief Financial Officer
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., October 07, 2025--The Campbell’s Company (NASDAQ:CPB) (Campbell’s) today announced the appointment of Todd Cunfer as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, effective Oct. 20, 2025. He will report to Campbell’s President and Chief Executive Officer Mick Beekhuizen and become a member of the company’s Operating Committee and an Executive Officer.
